C

com.github.nwillc.reloader - package com.github.nwillc.reloader
 

F

FileUtils - Class in com.github.nwillc.reloader
Utilites for working with files.
findNewest(Path) - Static method in class com.github.nwillc.reloader.FileUtils
Given a filename, of the versioned form "path-version.type" look at all the files matching "path.*\.type" and find the one with the newest modified date.

L

ls(Path, String) - Static method in class com.github.nwillc.reloader.FileUtils
List files in a directory that match a pattern.

O

onSignal(String) - Static method in class com.github.nwillc.reloader.Reloader
 
onSignal(String, Runnable, boolean) - Static method in class com.github.nwillc.reloader.Reloader
Set up a Un*x signal handler to call restartApplication(Runnable, boolean) when the signal is received.

R

Reloader - Class in com.github.nwillc.reloader
Utility class providing methods for reloading the current Java application.
restartApplication(Runnable, boolean) - Static method in class com.github.nwillc.reloader.Reloader
Restart the current application.

T

toPattern(Path) - Static method in class com.github.nwillc.reloader.FileUtils
Takes a path and attempts to return a regex pattern that handles any "version" of the file, for example "foo/bar/file-1.0.txt" would yield "file.+\.txt" which would match other versions such as "file-2.3.txt".
